TextView.android:text: Double check sanitizer, priming sugar & propane
Close valves on brew kettle & mash tun
Take bag out of mash tun
Drain mash tun to brew kettle
Transfer bag's wort to brew kettle
Bring to a boil & start timer
Sanitize lid of brew kettle & prepare ice bath
Set lid on brew kettle & activate wort chiller
Move primary fermenter to appropriate area
Move fermenter up & let sediment settle
